name: Join Blocks - Merge Puzzle
description:
#1 Relaxing Puzzle Game.

Join Blocks - We promise you will love this puzzle game. It will help you to train your mind and relax. If you love 2048, x2, blocks puzzles -you will love this game!

2, 4, 8, 16 ... 1024, 2048 ... you will not be bored connecting these blocks ;)

HOW TO PLAY

- Tap screen & shoot blocks
- Join blocks in a line with the same number
- Get higher number and challenge high score

Game Features

- Simple and modern design
- Addictive and innovative game play
- Leaderboard
- No time limit


This is a fun and classic addictive block puzzle game, worth hundreds of hours to keep you challenged and addictive. It will improve your cognitive abilities such as attention, concentration and logic reasoning.

Enjoy the game )
